# isUndoing

**Instance Property**

Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the manager is in the process of performing an undo action.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isUndoing: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

The value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the manager is performing its [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/UndoManager/undo()] or [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/UndoManager/undoNestedGroup()] method, otherwise [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Checking whether undo or redo is in process

- **isRedoing**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the manager is in the process of performing a redo action.
